alert.note: Alert for McDuffie (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 7:22PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of McDuffie County through 800 PM EDT... At 721 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Norwood to near Mitchell. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Thomson, Thomson-McDuffie County Airport, Dearing, Sweetwater Park, Arties Pond Public Fishing Area, McDuffie County Fire Department, Adamsville, Thomson Fire Department, McDuffie Regional Medical Center, University Hospital McDuffie, White Oak Campground, Boneville, Autney and Ansley Mill. This includes Interstate 20 in Georgia between mile markers 167 and 178. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
